name: God Save us from The Queen! (Game Jam game)
name_original: God Save us from The Queen! (Game Jam game)
description:
September 9, 2015: Queen Elizabeth II becomes the longest reigning British monarch in history. The British Empire celebrates its ruler.

February 6, 2072: On the day of QE2's Double Diamond Jubilee, British subjects begin to wonder – Is the Queen immortal?

One person is selected to ask that question to the ruler of the British Empire herself. That unlucky sap...is you.

You really wish you hadn't asked that question. The Queen, sensing her ruse is at an end, breaks into a sudden sprint towards you, jaws open wide to tear out your jugular.

Terror fills you as the Her Majesty quickly closes the distance between you.

RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!
